Pre-Game Insights: Ghana had previously won against Madagascar and Comoros had beaten the Central African Republic in their opening matches of the 2026 World Cup qualifiers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Moroni Stadium, a multi-use stadium in Comoros primarily used for athletics.
The last meeting between Comoros and Ghana was in the 2021 Africa Cup of Nations, where Comoros defeated Ghana 3-2.
